alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:57PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yavapai County through 430 PM MST... At 357 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cordes Junction, or 20 miles southwest of Camp Verde, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and hail up to penny size. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cordes Junction, Cordes Lakes and Spring Valley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 261 and 272. State Route 69 between mile markers 263 and 264. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
